name: SpellForce: The Shadow of the Phoenix
name_original: SpellForce: The Shadow of the Phoenix
description:
SpellForce: The Shadow of the Phoenix is a RPG-strategy game developed by Phenomic Game Development. It came out on 18-02-2005. JoWooD Productions published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play SpellForce: The Shadow of the Phoenix on PC.
